Actions.Text: REFERRED TO CORPORATIONS, AUTHORITIES AND COMMISSIONS
REFERRED TO CORPORATIONS, AUTHORITIES AND COMMISSIONS

Title: Requires the installation of air quality monitors in all subway stations
Summary: Requires the installation of air quality monitors in all subway stations; requires data from the air quality monitors to be accessible to the public; requires remedial action to improve air quality when it is found to exceed safe levels.
LawCode: Add ยง1266-m, Pub Auth L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the public authorities law, in relation to requiring the installation of air quality monitors in all subway stations
